conbody.p: Fill in the blanks is a type of question where students must fill in the blanks in a given text. Multiple correct options may be specified for each blank. This question will receive full score when every blank is filled in with one of the correct options.
These types of question will be presented to the students as shown in .

conbody.p: Select Fill in the blanks as the question type and enter the text into the editor panel ( ) marking the blanks with <..> symbols.
Enter the correct fill-in text between the < and >. Multiple options can be specified by separating them with a semicolon, for example <dog;cat>.
